PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ManufacturerOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Defines properties of individual instances of manufactured products that may be given by the manufacturer.

PropertyDef.Name: AcquisitionDate
PropertyDef.Definition: The date that the manufactured item was purchased.

PropertyDef.Name: BarCode
PropertyDef.Definition: The identity of the bar code given to an occurrence of the product

PropertyDef.Name: SerialNumber
PropertyDef.Definition: The serial number assigned to an occurrence of a product

PropertyDef.Name: BatchReference
PropertyDef.Definition: The identity of the batch reference from which an occurrence of a product is taken.
